sent.orig: And it is defined by Pushtunwali: there is no Pushtun nation or, in fact, ethnicity.
sent.trans: 根据“普什图瓦里”的定义，实际上不存在普什图民族(nation)或种族(ethnicity)。

sent.orig: Our military families serve our nation, they inspire our Nation, and tonight our nation honors them.
sent.trans: 我军家属为国效力，她们鼓舞著我们这个国家，因此，今晚，全国向她们致敬。

sent.orig: No nation can isolate itself with problems and no nation can solve them alone.
sent.trans: 没有哪一个国家能置身度外，也没有哪一个国家能独自解决这些问题。

sent.orig: No one nation can or should try to dominate another nation.
sent.trans: 没有哪一个国家能够或应该试图主宰另一个国家。

sent.orig: Grenada, an island nation like Taiwan, is the second smallest nation in the Caribbean.
sent.trans: 和台湾一样为岛国的格瑞那达，是加勒比海第二小国。
